transcript: 27-year-old male motor vehicle accident victim with head injury and internal bleeding. Patient was unconscious at scene. Head injury with possible intracranial bleeding. Blood pressure is 95/60. Heart rate is 125. Need immediate trauma activation for MVA with head injury.
activation_page: STAT trauma activation for 27-year-old male MVA victim with head injury and internal bleeding. Patient unconscious, blood pressure dropping. Immediate trauma team activation required.
